title: Foxworth Friday: Learning the art of debate, Justin Tinsley on 'The King of Crenshaw'
description:
Bomani Jones and Domonique Foxworth chat about the art of the debate and share stories of how they have sharpened their skills over the years against the likes of Around The Horn legends, Skip Bayless and Stephen A. Smith (1:21). Plus, Bomani’s eclectic musical taste (22:53) and Justin Tinsley of The Undefeated joins the guys to chat about his new 30 for 30 podcast about Los Angeles rapper Nipsey Hussle called “The King of Crenshaw” (41:46).

The Right Time Recommends...
30 for 30 Podcasts: https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/30-for-30-podcasts/id1244784611
